pull.title: descriptors: MuSig2
pull.body:
Implements parsing of BIP 390 `musig()` descriptors.

Depends on #31243

Split from #29675

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--006a51241073e994b41acfe9ec718e94-->
### Code Coverage & Benchmarks
For details see: https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/31244.
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
A summary of reviews will appear here.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#31243](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/31243) (descriptor: Move filling of keys from `DescriptorImpl::MakeScripts` to `PubkeyProvider::GetPubKey` by achow101)
* [#30243](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30243) (descriptors: taproot partial descriptors by Eunovo)
* [#29675](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29675) (wallet: Be able to receive and spend inputs involving MuSig2 aggregate keys by achow101)
* [#29491](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29491) ([EXPERIMENTAL] Schnorr batch verification for blocks by fjahr)
* [#28710](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28710) (Remove the legacy wallet and BDB dependency by achow101)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Can you add an example to `doc/descriptors.md`?

Did you mean [BIP390](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0390.mediawiki) in the description?

```
$ echo "cGsobXVzaWcoZGR9dXVlLzAwLylrKA==" | base64 --decode > mocked_descriptor_parse_1.crash
$ FUZZ=mocked_descriptor_parse fuzz mocked_descriptor_parse_1.crash
script/descriptor.cpp:1838 ParsePubkey: Assertion `Func("musig", expr)' failed.

$ echo "dHIobXVzaWcoICAgICB0dXVzKG9sZGVwayhnZylnZ2dnZmdnKTwseigoKCgoKCgoKCgoKCgoKCgoKCgoKHN0KQ==" | base64 --decode > mocked_descriptor_parse_2.crash
$ FUZZ=mocked_descriptor_parse fuzz mocked_descriptor_parse_2.crash
script/descriptor.cpp:1833 ParsePubkey: Assertion `split.size() <= 2' failed.
```
Fixed the fuzz crashes and added those descriptors to the unit tests.

```
$ echo "dHIobXVzaWcoJTIyLzMzMmgpSigoKChhZGRyKEJjdXUp" | base64 --decode > mocked_descriptor_parse_3.crash
$ FUZZ=mocked_descriptor_parse fuzz mocked_descriptor_parse_3.crash
script/descriptor.cpp:632 GetPubKey: Assertion `pubkey.has_value()' failed.
```

```
$ echo "dHIobXVzaWcoKS8wMDAwMTEp" | base64 --decode > descriptor_parse_1.crash
$ FUZZ=descriptor_parse fuzz descriptor_parse_1.crash
[libsecp256k1] illegal argument: pubkeys != NULL
```

```
$ echo "dHIobXVzaWcoJWU5LzwwOzAwMDAwMzU7MDYwOzM7MDY+KS82Nik=" | base64 --decode > mocked_descriptor_parse_4.crash
$ FUZZ=mocked_descriptor_parse fuzz mocked_descriptor_parse_4.crash
fuzz: script/descriptor.cpp:1942: std::vector<std::unique_ptr<PubkeyProvider>> (anonymous namespace)::ParsePubkey(uint32_t &, const Span<const char> &, ParseScriptContext, FlatSigningProvider &, std::string &): Assertion `pub.size() == 1' failed.
```

events.message:
wallet, rpc: Only allow keypool import from single key descriptors

Legacy wallets should only import keys to the keypool if they came in a
single key descriptor. Instead of relying on assumptions about the
descriptor based on how many pubkeys show up after expanding the
descriptor, explicitly mark descriptors as being single key type and use
that for the check.
descriptor: Remove unused parent_info from BIP32PUbKeyProvider::GetPubKey

descriptors: Have GetPubKey fill origins directly

Instead of having ExpandHelper fill in the origins in the
FlatSigningProvider output, have GetPubKey do it by itself. This reduces
the extra variables needed in order to track and set origins in
ExpandHelper.

Also changes GetPubKey to return a std::optional<CPubKey> rather than
using a bool and output parameters.

descriptors: Move FlatSigningProvider pubkey filling to GetPubKey

Instead of MakeScripts inconsistently filling the output
FlatSigningProvider with the pubkeys involved, just do it in GetPubKey.

descriptors: Have GetPrivKey fill keys directly

Instead of GetPrivKey returning a key and having the caller fill the
FlatSigningProvider, have GetPrivKey take the FlatSigningProvider and
fill it by itself. This will be necessary for descriptors such as
musig() where there are private keys that need to be added to the
FlatSigningProvider but do not directly appear in any resulting scripts.

GetPrivKey is now changed to void as the caller no longer cares whether
it succeeds or fails.

XOnlyPubKey: Add GetCPubKeys

We need to retrieve the even and odd compressed pubkeys for xonly
pubkeys, so add a function to do that. Also reuse it in GetKeyIDs.
script/parsing: Allow Const to not skip the found constant

util/string: Allow Split to include the separator

When splitting a string, sometimes the separator needs to be included.
Split will now optionally include the separator on the left side of the
splits, i.e. it appears at the end of the splits, except for the last
one.

Add MuSig2 Keyagg Cache class and functions

- MuSig2KeyAggCache contains a MuSig2KeyAggCacheImpl which has the
  secp256ke_musig_keyagg_cache object to avoid having to link libsecp256k1
  everywhere.
- GetMuSig2KeyAggCache creates the MuSig2KeyAggCache from a
  std::vector<CPubKey>
- GetCPubKeyFromMuSig2KeyAggCache creates a CPubKey from a cache created
  with GetMuSig2KeyAggCache
- MuSig2AggregatePubKeys does the two above functions together.
